name: my_sql_historical_data
description: connection to a my sql db for storing time series data.
help: This connection defines a table in a my-sql database that holds all the data produced by devices. In general, you can use this connection to store historical data from your devices which can then be used in views to display the history. This plugin requires the following parameters: - a reference to the my-sql database connection: this connection defines the database where the table will be located. - the name of the table and if this table needs to be created or not after saving the connection.
author: elastetic
